department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal: Custom-Fabricated Tractor-Mounted Granular Fertilizer Applicator

### Overview

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the provision of one (1) custom-fabricated tractor-mounted granular fertilizer applicator for the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Brandon Research & Development Centre (BRDC).

### Reporting and Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact Person: Isabelle Fournier (elle-la / she-her)
* Email: [isabelle.fournier2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:isabelle.fournier2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Details

* Tender Title: Custom-Fabricated Tractor-Mounted Granular Fertilizer Applicator
* Reference Number: WS4201710267-Doc4282598417
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS4201710267
* Publication Date: 2023-11-01
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-04T14:00:00 (Please note the closed tender is now open for a short time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-12-15
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-06-01
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Technical Specifications

The tender requires a custom-fabricated tractor-mounted granular fertilizer applicator for row crops.

### Notice and Attachments

Please note the Notice URL is: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17878463?extsite=MTc4Nzg0NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. There are no attachments to this tender.

### Additional Information

The contract is expected to start on December 15, 2023, and end on June 1, 2024. However, please note the process and guidelines announced in these contract terms.
